dependsOn.activity: Script Insert or Update Table CC_SCORE_VALUE

text.value:
@concat('INSERT INTO ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_DATA_FACTORY_HIST 
    (CREATED,
	CREATED_BY,
	LAST_UPD,
	LAST_UPD_BY,
	DATA_ID,
	DESCRIPTION,
	ERROR_MSG,
	STATUS) VALUES (CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',
	',pipeline().parameters.dataId,',
	''',pipeline().parameters.line,''',
	''',substring(replace(activity('Script Insert or Update Table CC_SCORE_VALUE').Error.Message,'''','"'),0,499),''',
	''E''
	)')

activities.name: Script Insert or Update Table CC_SCORE_VALUE

text.value: @if(variables('existing'),variables('scriptInsert'),variables('scriptUpdate'))

value.value:
@concat('UPDATE ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_SCORE_VALUE
    SET
	CREATED =',if(empty(split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[2]),concat('CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),''',convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),''')'),concat('''',split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[2],'''')),',
	CREATED_BY =',if(empty(split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[3]),concat('''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''''),concat('''',split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[3],'''')),',
	LAST_UPD =',if(empty(split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[4]),'NULL',concat('''',split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[4],'''')),',
	LAST_UPD_BY =',if(empty(split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[5]),'NULL',concat('''',split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[5],'''')),',
	ACCNT_ID =',if(empty(split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[6]),'NULL',concat('''',split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[6],'''')),',
	BILLING_ACCNT_ID =',if(empty(split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[7]),'NULL',concat('''',split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[7],'''')),',
	ACCNT_NO =',if(empty(split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[8]),'NULL',concat('''',split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[8],'''')),',
	CL_LEVEL =',if(empty(split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[9]),'NULL',concat('''',split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[9],'''')),',
	SCORE_RANGE =',if(empty(split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[10]),'NULL',concat('''',split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[10],'''')),',
	CL_TYPE =',if(empty(split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[11]),'NULL',concat('''',split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[11],'''')),',
	CL_CHANGE_REASON =',if(empty(split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[12]),'NULL',concat('''',split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[12],'''')),',
	OUTCOME_CD =',if(empty(split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[13]),'NULL',concat('''',split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[12],'''')),',
	OUTCOME_REASON =',if(empty(split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[14]),'NULL',concat('''',split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[14],'''')),',
	CREDIT_LIMIT =',if(empty(split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[15]),'NULL',concat('''',split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[15],'''')),',
	PERM_CREDIT_LIMIT =',if(empty(split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[16]),'NULL',concat('''',split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[16],'''')),',
	TEMP_CREDIT_LIMIT =',if(empty(split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[17]),'NULL',concat('''',split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[17],'''')),',
	PREV_CREDIT_LIMIT =',if(empty(split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[18]),'NULL',concat('''',split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[18],'''')),',
	PREV_SCORE_RANGE =',if(empty(split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[19]),'NULL',concat('''',split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[19],'''')),',
	ACTUAL =',if(empty(split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[20]),'NULL',concat('''',split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[20],'''')),',
	ACTUAL_PERM =',if(empty(split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[21]),'NULL',concat('''',split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[21],'''')),',
	BILLING_CREDIT_LIMIT =',if(empty(split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[22]),'NULL',concat('''',split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[22],'''')),',
	BILLING_THRESHOLD_SET_ID =',if(empty(split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[23]),'NULL',concat('''',split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[23],'''')),',
	FBB_FLAG =',if(empty(split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[24]),'NULL',concat('''',split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[24],'''')),',
	LAST_REVIEW_DAT =',if(empty(split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[25]),'NULL',concat('''',split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[25],'''')),',
	MIN_REVIEW =',if(empty(split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[26]),'NULL',concat('''',split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[26],'''')),',
	AVAILABLE_CREDIT =',if(empty(split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[27]),'NULL',concat('''',split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[27],'''')),',
	PAYMENT_FLG =',if(empty(split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[28]),'NULL',concat('''',split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[28],'''')),',
	BA_REGISTER_DT =',if(empty(split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[29]),'NULL',concat('''',split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[29],'''')),'
	WHERE ACCNT_ID = ''',split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[6],''';')

@concat('UPDATE ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_SCORE_VALUE
    SET
	CREATED =',if(empty(split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[2]),concat('CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),''',convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),''')'),concat('''',split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[2],'''')),',
	CREATED_BY =',if(empty(split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[3]),concat('''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''''),concat('''',split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[3],'''')),',
	LAST_UPD =',if(empty(split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[4]),'NULL',concat('''',split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[4],'''')),',

	ACCNT_NO =',if(empty(split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[8]),'NULL',concat('''',split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[8],'''')),',

	SCORE_RANGE =',if(empty(split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[10]),'NULL',concat('''',split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[10],'''')),',
	CL_TYPE =',if(empty(split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[11]),'NULL',concat('''',split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[11],'''')),',
	CL_CHANGE_REASON =',if(empty(split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[12]),'NULL',concat('''',split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[12],'''')),',
	OUTCOME_CD =',if(empty(split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[13]),'NULL',concat('''',split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[12],'''')),',
	OUTCOME_REASON =',if(empty(split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[14]),'NULL',concat('''',split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[14],'''')),',
	CREDIT_LIMIT =',if(empty(split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[15]),'NULL',concat('''',split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[15],'''')),',
	PERM_CREDIT_LIMIT =',if(empty(split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[16]),'NULL',concat('''',split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[16],'''')),',
	TEMP_CREDIT_LIMIT =',if(empty(split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[17]),'NULL',concat('''',split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[17],'''')),',
	PREV_CREDIT_LIMIT =',if(empty(split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[18]),'NULL',concat('''',split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[18],'''')),',
	PREV_SCORE_RANGE =',if(empty(split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[19]),'NULL',concat('''',split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[19],'''')),',
	ACTUAL =',if(empty(split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[20]),'NULL',concat('''',split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[20],'''')),',
	ACTUAL_PERM =',if(empty(split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[21]),'NULL',concat('''',split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[21],'''')),',
	BILLING_CREDIT_LIMIT =',if(empty(split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[22]),'NULL',concat('''',split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[22],'''')),',
	BILLING_THRESHOLD_SET_ID =',if(empty(split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[23]),'NULL',concat('''',split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[23],'''')),',
	FBB_FLAG =',if(empty(split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[24]),'NULL',concat('''',split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[24],'''')),',
	LAST_REVIEW_DAT =',if(empty(split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[25]),'NULL',concat('''',split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[25],'''')),',
	MIN_REVIEW =',if(empty(split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[26]),'NULL',concat('''',split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[26],'''')),',

text.value:
@concat('INSERT INTO ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_DATA_FACTORY_HIST 
    (CREATED,
	CREATED_BY,
	LAST_UPD,
	LAST_UPD_BY,
	DATA_ID,
	DESCRIPTION,
	ERROR_MSG,
	STATUS) VALUES (CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',
	',pipeline().parameters.dataId,',
	''',pipeline().parameters.line,''',
	''',if(and(not(equals(trim(coalesce(split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[9],'')),'CA')),not(equals(trim(coalesce(split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[9],'')),'BA'))),'clLevel not match Ca or Ba',
		if(and(equals(trim(coalesce(split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[9],'')),'CA'),equals(trim(coalesce(split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[6],'')),'')),'accntId data not found',
		if(and(equals(trim(coalesce(split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[9],'')),'BA'),equals(trim(coalesce(split(pipeline().parameters.line,'|')[6],'')),'')),'accntId data not found',
		'billingAccntId data not found'))),''',
	''E''
	)')

activities.name: Update RESPONSE_FILE not have input file_copy1

text.value:
@concat('UPDATE ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_RESPONSE_FILE 
	SET LAST_UPD = CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),''',convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	LAST_UPD_BY = ''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',
	STATUS = ''P'',
	DESCRIPTION = ''Query response detail ',string(pipeline().parameters.countRecord),' record'' WHERE RES_ID =',pipeline().parameters.resId,';')

dependsOn.activity: Update RESPONSE_FILE not have input file_copy1

text.value:
@concat('DELETE ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_TEMP_FILE_DETAIL
        WHERE FILE_ID = ',pipeline().parameters.fileId,'')

        WHERE FILE_ID = ',pipeline().parameters.fileId,'')

	SET LAST_UPD = CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),''',convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	LAST_UPD_BY = ''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',
	STATUS = ''S'',
	DESCRIPTION = ''Query response detail ',string(pipeline().parameters.countRecord),' record | create file ',pipeline().parameters.fileName,' in path ',pipeline().parameters.outputPath,' complete'' WHERE RES_ID =',pipeline().parameters.resId,';')

	STATUS = ''E'',
	DESCRIPTION = ''',activity('create file output').Error.Message,''' WHERE RES_ID =',pipeline().parameters.resId,';')

source.sqlReaderQuery: select * from CREDIT.CC_CURRENT c where c.LOV_TYPE= 'CC_MONITOR_MASTER' and c.LOV_NAME = 'sff_cc_review_cl_res' and c.ACTIVE_FLG ='Y';

text.value:
@concat('INSERT INTO ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_DATA_FACTORY 
	(CREATED,
	CREATED_BY,
	LAST_UPD,
	LAST_UPD_BY,
	DATA_TYPE,
	STATUS,
	DESCRIPTION) OUTPUT INSERTED.DATA_ID VALUES (CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',
	''',pipeline().parameters.DATA_TYPE,''',
	''P'',''Process review send account id count ',if(greaterOrEquals(sub(pipeline().parameters.count,int(variables('offset'))),float(pipeline().parameters.limitPerRound)),pipeline().parameters.limitPerRound,sub(pipeline().parameters.count,int(variables('offset')))),''');')

@concat('UPDATE ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_DATA_FACTORY 
	SET LAST_UPD = CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),''',convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	LAST_UPD_BY = ''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',
	STATUS = ''E'',
	DESCRIPTION = ''',substring(concat('CC_ReviewDataFactorySendBilingNoProcessAccountNoList Exception :',replace(activity('CC_CreateFileAndArchive').Error.Message,'''','"')),0,if(less(length(replace(activity('CC_CreateFileAndArchive').Error.Message,'''','"')),499),length(replace(activity('CC_CreateFileAndArchive').Error.Message,'''','"')),499)),''' WHERE DATA_ID =',string(first(first(activity('insert CC_DATA_FACTORY onprocess').output.resultSets).rows).DATA_ID),';')

@concat('UPDATE ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_DATA_FACTORY 
	SET LAST_UPD = CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),''',convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	LAST_UPD_BY = ''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',
	FILE_NAME = ',concat('''',variables('fileName'),''''),',
	FILE_NAME_SYNC = ',concat('''',variables('fileNameArchive'),''''),',
	FILE_PATH = ''',pipeline().parameters.outputPath,''',
	STATUS = ''S'',
	DESCRIPTION = ''',concat('Create File : ',variables('fileName'),' success'),''' WHERE DATA_ID =',string(first(first(activity('insert CC_DATA_FACTORY onprocess').output.resultSets).rows).DATA_ID),';')

value.value:
@concat('SELECT
	''01|'' + ''',variables('processTime'),''' AS LINE  
    UNION ALL 
    SELECT T.LINE FROM (',variables('scriptQuerySelect'),') T
    UNION ALL 
    SELECT ''09|'' + CONVERT(varchar(255),COUNT(T2.LINE)) AS LINE FROM (',variables('scriptQuerySelect'),') T2; ')

activities.name: Update CC_DATA_FACTORY Catch Loop Insert HIST

text.value:
@concat('UPDATE ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_DATA_FACTORY
    SET LAST_UPD = CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	LAST_UPD_BY =''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',
	STATUS = ''E'',
	FILE_NAME = ''',pipeline().parameters.fileDatName,''',
	DESCRIPTION = ''Process file name : ',pipeline().parameters.fileDatName,' total count ',string(activity('Copy data to CC_TEMP_FILE_DETAIL').output.rowsRead),' record -> count process ',string(sub(activity('Copy data to CC_TEMP_FILE_DETAIL').output.rowsRead,2)),' record.''
	WHERE DATA_ID = ',pipeline().parameters.dataId)

	SET LAST_UPD = CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),''')
	, LAST_UPD_BY = ''',
	pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,
	''', STATUS = ''E'',',
	' DESCRIPTION = ''Unable to move the file name : ',pipeline().parameters.fileSyncName,'''',
	' WHERE DATA_ID =',pipeline().parameters.dataId,';')

	, LAST_UPD_BY = ''',

@concat('INSERT INTO ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_DATA_FACTORY_PROFILE_CHANGE (DATA_ID,PROCESS_TYPE) VALUES (',pipeline().parameters.dataId,',''',activity('Read 01').output.firstRow.Prop_0,''')')

sqlReaderQuery.value: @concat('SELECT ROW_ID AS OLD_COUNT FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_DATA_FACTORY_PROFILE_CHANGE WHERE DATA_ID = ',pipeline().parameters.dataId,' AND PROCESS_TYPE = ''09''')

text.value:
@concat('UPDATE ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_DATA_FACTORY_PROFILE_CHANGE
    SET PROCESS_TYPE = ''09|',activity('SELECT old 09').output.firstrow.OLD_COUNT,'''
    ,ROW_ID = NULL 
    WHERE DATA_ID = ',pipeline().parameters.dataId,' AND PROCESS_TYPE = ''09''')

@concat('UPDATE ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_DATA_FACTORY
    SET LAST_UPD = CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	LAST_UPD_BY =''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',
	STATUS = ''S'',
	FILE_NAME = ''',pipeline().parameters.fileDatName,''',
	DESCRIPTION = ''Process file name : ',pipeline().parameters.fileDatName,' total count ',string(activity('Copy data to CC_TEMP_FILE_DETAIL').output.rowsRead),' record -> count process ',string(sub(activity('Copy data to CC_TEMP_FILE_DETAIL').output.rowsRead,2)),' record.''
	WHERE DATA_ID = ',pipeline().parameters.dataId)

sqlReaderQuery.value: @concat('SELECT * FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_DATA_FACTORY_PROFILE_CHANGE WHERE DATA_ID = ',pipeline().parameters.dataId,' AND PROCESS_TYPE LIKE ''02%'';')

value.value:
@concat('SELECT BILLING_ACCNT_NO  FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CHANGE_CAT_SUBCAT_INFO 
GROUP BY BILLING_ACCNT_NO ORDER BY BILLING_ACCNT_NO OFFSET ',variables('offset'),' ROWS FETCH NEXT ',variables('limitPerRound'),' ROWS ONLY;')

activities.name: Insert to change cat subcat Hist

dependsOn.activity: Insert to change cat subcat Hist

text.value:
@concat('UPDATE ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CHANGE_CAT_SUBCAT 
    SET LAST_UPD = CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	LAST_UPD_BY =''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',
	CHANGE_TYPE = ''',pipeline().parameters.CHANGE_TYPE,''',
	STATUS = ''',if(variables('haveError'),'E','S'),''',
	DESCRIPTION =''Create FileError''
	WHERE CHANGE_ID = ',pipeline().parameters.changeId)

@concat('INSERT INTO ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_DATA_FACTORY_HIST 
    (CREATED,
	CREATED_BY,
	LAST_UPD,
	LAST_UPD_BY,
	DATA_ID,
	DESCRIPTION,
	ERROR_MSG,
	STATUS) VALUES (CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',
	',pipeline().parameters.dataId,',
	''',item().Prop_0,''',

activities.name: Script Insert or Update Table CC_CREDIT_ASSIGN

text.value:
@concat('INSERT INTO ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_DATA_FACTORY_HIST 
    (CREATED,
	CREATED_BY,
	LAST_UPD,
	LAST_UPD_BY,
	DATA_ID,
	DESCRIPTION,
	ERROR_MSG,
	STATUS) VALUES (CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',
	',pipeline().parameters.dataId,',
	''',item().Prop_0,''',
	''',replace(activity('Script Insert or Update Table CC_CREDIT_ASSIGN').Error.Message,'''','"'),''',
	''E''
	)')
